txt.en: You have defeated Isvítha the Gluttonous, allowing safe passage into the Anvil of Winterstith.
Isvítha the Gluttonous guards the entrance to the Anvil of Winterstith.
The Anvil of Winterstith: Isvítha the Gluttonous -- Tier 1
Isvítha the Gluttonous guards the entrance to the Anvil of Winterstith.
High Priest Dáuraga and High Priestess Khôkali have led the Order of the Eye into the Mordath to seek revenge on the Firehorn Dwarves and lay claim to the Dark Lord's most powerful artifacts.
You have defeated High Priest Dáuraga and High Priestess Khôkali and put an end to the Order of the Eye's plans to seize Sauron's artifacts from the Mordath.
